COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108
STRING: We practiced in Chris's apartment today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114
STRING: We agreed to after lunch, but I left my house a little
early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a
STRING: Chris knew my personality, so I was sure he wouldn't
mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140
STRING: If he was still asleep...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: I might be able to see Chris just after he wakes up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: I thought that would be fun, but I would probably have
to make myself scold him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e
STRING: That was my duty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, are you here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: It was noon on Sunday, was he still sleeping?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: Even though we had the chance to practice together for
half a day or more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: With those thoughts in mind I knocked again, but I
couldn't hear anyone moving inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8
STRING: I tried the knob and it was unexpectedly unlocked and
opened right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e
STRING: [Torta] “E-Excuse me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: As soon as I entered the room, I heard water running
from the shower.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: He must have still been in there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: I thought he should have woken up earlier, and when I
checked the clock, I saw it was exactly noon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c
STRING: We had agreed on the afternoon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8
STRING: It was just semantics, but even a minute after 12 would
be fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be
STRING: That being said, I couldn't go into the shower and force
him out, so I had to kill time somehow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: I felt embarrassed imagining seeing Chris half naked, so
I walked into the room and gazed out the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe
STRING: As I was doing that, I heard the door of the shower
open and sensed him wrapping a towel around himself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326
STRING: I made sure enough time had passed, then turned
around and spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Chris] “How did you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: [Torta] “Didn't you leave the door unlocked for me...?
Oh, did you forget to lock it? That's dangerous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it's lucky I forgot to lock it. I'm glad you
didn't have to wait in the cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: [Torta] “Really lucky.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: [Chris] “But aren't you early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x426
STRING: [Torta] “It's after noon, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x458
STRING: [Chris] “I'll ask just in case... What time did you get
here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48c
STRING: [Chris] “Wouldn't you just say exactly twelve?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: [Torta] “No, I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d6
STRING: [Torta] “I wouldn't say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: [Chris] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Chris] “I just woke up...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: [Torta] “You took a shower, so I'm sure you're awake
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x584
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, fine... Did you eat lunch?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: [Torta] “Not really. You don't eat breakfast, do you,
Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Chris] “Not usually. What do you want to do, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e2
STRING: [Torta] “I'd be fine until the evening if I had to be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x614
STRING: [Chris] “Then... Should I make something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65c
STRING: [Chris] “It'd be easier for me than just practicing right
away. Though I can only make simple stuff, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67c
STRING: [Torta] “Yay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, sit down and wait for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, sir.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d4
STRING: I sat in a chair and passed the time elegantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: Was this the first time that Chris had made something
for me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: I had come here as Arietta on Natale, but I wasn't me
then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70c
STRING: It may have been the first time that it was for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x722
STRING: It made me strangely happy, and I spent the time
watching Chris from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: I knew that he would definitely turn to face me at some
point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: It was an incredibly happy time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: After a while, I heard a voice from the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: [Chris] “It's ready; can you help me carry it to the
table... Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c4
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Yeah, I'm coming.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7da
STRING: I hurried to the kitchen, and brought cups and plates for
two to the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f0
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that looks good. And there's chocolate
spread.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x806
STRING: The chocolate spread for the rusk was in a pretty bottle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81c
STRING: A fair amount had been used, so he must not have
gotten it for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Chris] “You always said you liked it, Torta, so I bought
some and I like it, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86e
STRING: [Torta] “I see. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x884
STRING: But I was a little glad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x898
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: [Torta] “Mm, don't mind if I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c4
STRING: It wasn't a bad breakfast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: The espresso with lots of milk was tasty, and went well
with the chocolate-covered rusk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e6
STRING: It was a rather happy time before practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: We practiced until evening, and it became the time for
the letter to Chris to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x942
STRING: When I told Chris that, he went to get it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: [Chris] “I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Torta] “Was the letter there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b4
STRING: Chris came into the room and put the letter in the
drawer without opening it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ca
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Aren't you going to read it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah I'm going to read it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: [Torta] “Then why did you put it away?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: [Chris] “Because I'll read it later, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? You can just read it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5c
STRING: I kind of got the feeling that I wanted to see Chris's face
when he read the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa72
STRING: Did he smile?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7e
STRING: Or did he just think a letter was a letter, and read it
calmly?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa94
STRING: Regardless, reading what I did in Chris's letters, I could
at least be sure it wasn't the latter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac6
STRING: [Chris] “What...? I don't usually read letters in front of
people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay, I won't look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: I would only look at Chris's face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1a
STRING: [Chris] “Then why are you trying to make me read it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb30
STRING: [Torta] “I was just thinking you should read it quickly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: [Chris] “There's plenty of time before tomorrow
morning... That being said, I feel like there's something
else to this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: That was pretty astute for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8e
STRING: But if I was interested as Torta, there was nothing to
hide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba4
STRING: If he suspected me that much, he'd never read it in front
of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbba
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... No, I was just wondering what kind of
face you make when read her letters, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: [Chris] “There's no particular face. It's just a normal face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc00
STRING: [Torta] “So that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: [Chris] “That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: Unsatisfied with his innocuous answer, I tried opening
the drawer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: So this was the drawer I'd heard about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: It was full of letters from me, different from the promise
Chris and Arie had made.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcaa
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, don't do that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: [Torta] “Oh it's fine. I'm not doing any harm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd6
STRING: I said this and took the letter out of the drawer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce2
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? These are all letters under here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: I pretended I didn't know and checked inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd04
STRING: He really was keeping them methodically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: I wouldn't speak badly of others, but as a boy's drawer,
it wasn't particularly interesting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... So don't look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd58
STRING: [Torta] “I can't look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: [Chris] “You get letters from Arie, right Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: [Torta] “That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure these are no different. She just writes
what's happened recently, and what she's doing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: [Torta] “But... You keep them so carefully.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfc
STRING: [Chris] “Well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: [Torta] “Aww, I wanted to see your smiling face, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: [Chris] “I don't smile... Regardless, I'll read the letter and
write the reply after you leave, Torta, so don't worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: [Torta] “So there's no hope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: [Chris] “So, what do you want to do now? Do you want
to go get something to eat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. That would be fine, or you could make
something, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefa
STRING: [Chris] “Are you as bad at cooking as always, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf10
STRING: [Torta] “I just don't think it's for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf42
STRING: [Chris] “Even though Arie is so good at it. Why don't you
try practicing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf58
STRING: [Torta] “I have been...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6e
STRING: I had already been practicing with Grandma for three
years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: But I could only show him how good I was when I saw
Chris as Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfac
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see. So do you want to try cooking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: [Torta] “You're teasing me now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff4
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't mean to. What does it mean that you
heard it like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100a
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mind. If you say you really want to eat
my cooking, Chris, I'll make something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1046
STRING: [Chris] “You'll eat, too, right Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105c
STRING: [Torta] “I won't eat. Of course not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: [Chris] “I'll ask just in case, but you've gotten better
since coming here, right? Ninna is good at cooking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: [Torta] “I suppose you could look at it like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c2
STRING: [Chris] “I think... No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Torta] “That's why you should cook, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: It was a little hard that I had to use a begging voice like
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1118
STRING: Even though I could already make food that would
satisfy Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112e
STRING: But I hid that, and watched as Chris walked to the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1176
STRING: Chris made pepperoncini pasta for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118c
STRING: I remembered the taste.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1198
STRING: It was indeed tasty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b8
STRING: [Torta] “Isn't that too much garlic?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: I couldn't say it before, but I could say it now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess. It might be more than what you usually
get at a restaurant. But... Isn't this better?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: [Torta] “It is good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, well that's good, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Torta] “Even though you're eating with a girl.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127c
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think I have to worry about that with you,
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: [Torta] “That may be true, but I kind of feel like you're
looking down on me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b0
STRING: [Chris] “That's not my intention.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c6
STRING: Of course we weren't close enough to kiss, so there
was nothing to worry about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: Huh? That reminded me... It was the same when I was
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: I asked nonchalantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f4
STRING: Most things got by if I said it was written in a letter from
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: Arie and I were that close, and Chris knew that well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: [Torta] “Well, you did make the same thing when Arie
came.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135c
STRING: [Chris] “What did she say in her letter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: Luckily Chris accepted the lie without me having to
explain it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: [Torta] “What? Oh what was it? It was about last year, I
forgot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b0
STRING: [Chris] “That means it was nothing special, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c6
STRING: [Torta] “I said I forgot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f8
STRING: [Chris] “If... If that's the case, then fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Right. She said you didn't even kiss her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142e
STRING: Of course, that was a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: [Chris] “Gah...How much did she write...? I know you're
her little sister, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1476
STRING: [Torta] “I wouldn't have said it if you hadn't asked, Chris.
You deserved it. I'm sure your letters have things you
can't tell me about, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a8
STRING: [Chris] “No they don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: [Torta] “Really? Then show me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: [Chris] “Listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha, I'm kidding. I have an idea what Arie
would write.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: [Chris] “No, you may be twins, but you're very different.
Even in one letter, the quality's different, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Torta] “So... I take it you're making a fool of me now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: Chris really was an idiot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1584
STRING: But that was also one of his good points.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: I'm sure he never imagined that the same person was
writing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a6
STRING: It was better than being caught, so this may have been
perfect.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c4
STRING: [Chris] “No. I mean that you have your good points, too,
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e4
STRING: [Torta] “That sounds like a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: [Chris] “Listen... It doesn't matter, so let's hurry and eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: [Torta] “We'll talk about that later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1660
STRING: [Torta] “I'll go home soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1692
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it's late so I'll walk you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a8
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine. Why don't you save that kind of thing
for Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up. I'm walking you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16dc
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172e
STRING: Under a streetlight, I asked Chris when we parted ways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173a
STRING: A dangerous question that would break the close
atmosphere we had had that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: But I just had to ask.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1766
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1784
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179a
STRING: [Torta] “Do you plan on just making me your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b0
STRING: What would I do if the answer wasn't the one I wanted?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17bc
STRING: While it was indistinct, the answer had already been
decided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c8
STRING: I would treat him kindly as Arietta, and have him
graduate like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17de
STRING: If Chris still liked Arie, they could probably do better
than I expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f4
STRING: Even if Arie didn't regain consciousness, if Chris could
handle that, I would just help him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180a
STRING: If Chris really did like Arietta... He would probably
hesitate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1820
STRING: He would think it was okay not to make a decision yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: That's why I tested Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: [Chris] “I do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: Chris wavered for a very short time, then answered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1876
STRING: [Torta] “That was a bad question... Can you decide here
and now? Partnering up with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: I thought he'd answer that way if I asked him whether
he wanted to make me his partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ac
STRING: That was Chris's personality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: So I chose my words again, and tested Chris again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: [Chris] “I can decide... That's what I meant when I said
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1900
STRING: [Torta] “Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: [Torta] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194a
STRING: For who...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1956
STRING: I just couldn't ask the question that I had been planning
to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196c
STRING: But Chris continued, looking like he understood
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1994
STRING: [Chris] “For myself. Is that bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19aa
STRING: If that was the case... I was fine with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b6
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19cc
STRING: I answered this in a whisper, accepting it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, thanks for being my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0a
STRING: [Torta] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2e
STRING: I just answered that, and I was genuinely happy that my
decision about the future was being put off.
